content:
The BAR^P10 event is used to communicate Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) grouping in HL7 v2.8. It consist of GP1 and GP2 segments which captures APC grouping and other related information.
image.png
I am not able to find any resource or attribute in FHIR to capture these details. Need advise how it can be mapped in FHIR
It's probably best to ask this on #v2 to FHIR
